messages.content: What is the purpose of the klinter_nodes pack?
The klinter_nodes pack is created to challenge the developer's coding skills and to provide nodes that the developer likes to use in their workflows.
What is the String concat node used for?
The String concat node is used to add strings together, and it is mostly used for creating prompts.
How does the Filter node work?
The Filter node is a proof-of-concept of a bad words list filtering system that changes the bad words found in a prompt to a good one.
What is the purpose of the Size selector node?
The Size selector node is used in almost all the developer's workflows to call for sizes from an external list. It is currently a work in progress.
What features are planned for the Size selector node in the future?
The developer plans to add an aspect ratio chooser, custom size option, and a height/width one size calculator to the Size selector node.
What is the current status of the PresentString node?
The PresentString node is not available at the moment (n/a atm).
Is the klinter_nodes pack a finished product?
No, the klinter_nodes pack is a work in progress as the developer is still learning and improving their coding skills.
